title: Spectator mode not working.
body:
So i tried spectator mode on new client, as well as on legacy. Spectate option is avaliable but every time i click it i get the loading circle instead of mouse button, and a black screen, after a while it says "spectator mode failed" or it simply does not respond.

In 80% of time i have to shut down the process thru task manager or force shutdown on it.

It's been hapening for a while and i was wondering am i the only one with this problem and how do i fix it?

replies.body:
I've seen a few reports on spectate this morning, but haven't had follow ups to look into it further.  Is on the updated or legacy client?  Does spectate work fine on the legacy?

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Also, generally black screens like that can be caused by network issues blocking access to the game server.  Go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Go over each instruction and let me know the results.

I've tried what you pasted here, i even updated java and reseted my IP adress, still bugged, i don't think this is a problem on our side but yours.

I can play the game pefectly fine, it only causes a problem when i try to spectate. Also i have a 94mbps speed so my connection problem is out of the way.

Everything else working fine on my PC (google, youtube, etc), and i as well have a pretty solid PC so i doubt it's something related with that

This is the answer i got from Riot for 1 hour ago.


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Hello there,

Thanks for reaching out to me. We're aware that some of our players encounter issues while trying to spectate and we're working hard to get it fixed. Unfortunately, I can't provide you a time and date when it will be fixed in order to prevent any sort of confusion.

I appreciate your patience and understanding regarding this issue, and thank you again for taking time out of your day to send us this report. Please let me know if you have any questions.

Radkus
Player Support Specialist
